required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetic Interaction Between Amlodipine and Losartan
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacokinetic and Hemodynamic Interactions Between Amlodipine and Losartan in Humans

brief_summary.textblock: This clinical trial aims to assess the pharmacokinetic interaction between amlodipine and losartan in healthy male subjects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: an open-label, three-period, fixed-sequence clinical trial

primary_outcome.measure: AUCtau(area under the plasma concentration-time curve for a dosing interval at steady state)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax,ss(Maximum plasma concentration of the drug at steady state)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmin,ss(Minimum concentration of the drug in plasma at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax,ss(Time to maximum plasma concentration at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46
0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46

secondary_outcome.measure: CLss/F(Apparent total body clearance of the drug from plasma at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46

secondary_outcome.measure: Vd,ss/F(Apparent volume of distribution at steady state)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46
0 (predose) ~ 24 hours at day 9, day 31, and day 46

arm_group.arm_group_label: Amlodipine, losartan, and amlodipine plus losartan
arm_group.description: Period 1: amlodipine 10mg will be administered orally once a day for 9 days. Period 2: losartan 100mg will be administered orally once a day for 9 days after 13 days of the washout period. Period 3: amlodipine 10mg once a day plus losartan 100mg once a day will be administered orally for 9 days after 6 days of the washout period.

intervention.description: Amlodipine 10mg will be administered orally twice a day for 9 days
intervention.arm_group_label: Amlodipine, losartan, and amlodipine plus losartan

intervention.description: Losartan 100mg will be administered orally once a day for 9 days
intervention.arm_group_label: Amlodipine, losartan, and amlodipine plus losartan

intervention.description: Amlodipine plus Losartan same way as "arm: amlodipine" and "arm: losartan"
intervention.arm_group_label: Amlodipine, losartan, and amlodipine plus losartan

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Healthy volunteers aged between ≥ 20 and ≤ 45 years old
2. Weight ≥ 50kg, with calculated body mass index(BMI) of ≥ 18 and ≤ 29.9kg/m²
3. Subjects who agree to use a combination of effective contraceptive methods or medically acceptable contraceptive methods for up to 28 days after the date of administration of the clinical trial drug and agree not to provide sperm
4. Subject who are informed of the investigational nature of this study, voluntarily agree to participate in this study
Exclusion Criteria:
1. History or presence of a clinically significant and active cardiovascular, respiratory, hepatobiliary, renal, hematological, gastrointestinal, endocrine, immune, dermatologic, neurologic or psychiatric disorder
2. With symptoms indicating acute illness within 28 days prior to the first Investigational Product administration
3. Any medical history that may affect drug absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion
4. Genetic problems such as galactose intolerance, Lapp lactose dehydrogenase deficiency or glucose-galactose uptake disorder
5. Any clinically significant active chronic disease

facility.name: Dept. of Clinical Pharmacology & Toxicology, Anam Hospital, Korea University College of Medicine
